item.title: ksplice kernel updates and Exadata patching
item.description: If you have installed some one off ksplice fix for kernel on Exadata, remember to uninstall it before you do a kernel upgradeÂ  eg regular Exadata patching. As such fixes are kernel version specific so they may not work with the newer version of the kernel.
